channel.title: hugo on RILLA KHALED
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on RILLA KHALED

item.title: Only Two
item.description: Fast, cheap, good. This much is true. You can't have three, but you can have two. Other (common) cases no one bothers to mention: one | none.

item.title: Sliders
item.description: Today I am experimenting with: CSS: overriding field input default styling, transitions, and transforms injecting regular HTML into Hugo size and color This is all style and no substance looking for a substantive home. (Toggle away).
